Nominations & Appointments

May 2, 2017
NOMINATIONS SENT TO THE SENATE:Marshall Billingslea, of Virginia, to be Assistant Secretary for
Terrorist Financing, Department of the Treasury, vice Daniel L.
Glaser.Russell Vought, of Virginia, to be Deputy Director of the Office
